roleset.name: to show or exhibit
roleset.note: FLAUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flaunt' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from flaunt.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But MCI , of Washington , was displeased with the FCC decision concerning Tariff 12 , [*-1] arguing that `` [AT& T]-2 can not be allowed [*-2] to flaunt FCC rules . ''
